definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: circuit, boundary, territory—´[[ג]] Ez Eze 47:8, 2Ki 15:29; pl. cstr. [[גְּלִילוֹת]] Jos 13:2, Jos 22:10, Jos 22:11, Joe 4:4 ;—belonging to a people [[בָּל־גְּלִילוֹת]] [[הַפְּלִשְׁתִּים]] Jos 13:2 cf. Joe 4:4 ([[פְּ לָָשֶׁת]] ´[[כּׂל ג]]); so [[הַיַּרְדֵּן]] ´[[ג]] Jos 22:10, Jos 22:11 acc. to some, but v. foll.; abs. Ez Eze 47:8 [[הַקַּדְמוֹנׇה]] ´[[הַגּ]]; as

definitions.title: n.pr.loc.
definitions.body: 2Ki 15:29 Galilee, LXX Galilaia (‖[[כּׂל אֶרֶץ נַפְתָּלִי]]) cf. II. [[גׇּלִיל]].
